description: Explore various budget-friendly food stalls and cafés along Maginhawa Street in Quezon City.
Visit artsy cafes around Metro Manila perfect for IG-worthy photos and chill vibes.
Hunt for fashion gems in thrift stores like those in Baguio or Cubao Expo.
Enjoy the famous golden hour by the bay with street food on the side.
Record a trending TikTok dance challenge with your barkada or partner.
Put on your earphones, walk around your barangay or park while listening to a Filipino podcast.
Create a mini-zine together with cutouts, poetry, and drawings — analog bonding for artsy couples.
Organize a karaoke session at someone’s bahay or barangay kubo — classic Pinoy bonding.
Explore Teyvat together in a chill Genshin Impact co-op session, perfect for gaming couples.
Join a community-driven cleanup drive, food distribution, or donation drive.
